name: Winter Terrain Project!
description:
Description: This project I created was a terrain that you can use your arrow keys and mouse to move around! I had a lot of fun adding my own creativity into the landscape. From this project, I learned how to create mountains, lakes, particles like snow, paint textures, and move around. I hope you have fun with it!

Directions: Use your arrow keys to move around the terrain! You can use your mouse to navigate the scene!
